Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm SuperHappySquid and I make KSP space combat videos on YouTube. My first series has just been completed and the second one is in the works. It's a little crumby and short, but it was more of a trial run for bigger things to come in the future. All of my videos use no mods of any kind and I hope that you guys can give me some feedback! I don't have a huge subscriber base so any tips for improvements would be greatly appreciated.

Enjoy!

P.S I hope this isn't violating any forum rules or anything, I'm just looking for some honest feedback.
